src:
Po 20 letih spet ljubi
Igralec Keanu Reeves je Alexandro pokazal na rdeči preprogi. Njegovo zadnje uradno razmerje se je končalo leta 1999.
07 Nov 2019, 19:00 by T. P.



Svetu je pokazal, da spet ljubi in je ljubljen. FOTO: guliver/cover images



Govorice o romanci so začele krožiti minuli mesec.



Njegovo zadnje uradno ljubezensko razmerje sega v leto 1999 z Jennifer Syme.



guliver/cover images Romantično so ga povezovali s Sandro Bullock, a med njima menda nikoli bilo več od prijateljstva. FOTO: guliver/cover images



instagram Z Alexandro sta ga sprva povezovali poklicno sodelovanje in prijateljstvo. FOTO: instagram



guliver/GETTY IMAGESBosta žalost in srčna bolečina zdaj izginili iz njegovega pogleda? FOTO: guliver/getty images


V svetu lepih in bogatih, ki jim žepe polni filmska iluzija, menjavanje partnerjev ni nič nenavadnega. Filmski zvezdniki se zaljubljajo in razhajajo kot po tekočem traku. Najbrž hitreje kot običajni smrtniki, vsekakor pa precej bolj odmevno in na očeh javnosti. Zato tedaj, ko kateri od hollywoodskih težkokategornikov na rdeči preprogi pokaže novo srčno izvoljenko (ali izvoljenca), komaj še trenemo z očmi.


Bosta žalost in srčna bolečina zdaj izginili iz njegovega pogleda? FOTO: guliver/getty imagesguliver/GETTY IMAGES

A ne, ko gre za Keanuja Reevesa; če bi bil zaljubljeni sprehod po rdeči preprogi merilo, bi zanj lahko trdili, da v življenju še ni imel resnega dekleta. V svojih 35 letih v Hollywoodu se je zdaj namreč prvič sprehodil po rdeči prepogi držeč se za roke, zaljubljenih pogledov in nežnih dotikov.Ženske ga obožujejo. V preteklosti so ga povezovali z več filmskimi lepoticami, med drugimi s Sandro Bullock, Amando de Cadenet in Claire Forlani, a je vse te govorice bodisi preslišal bodisi zavrnil kot neutemeljene, češ da ga z njimi povezuje zgolj prijateljstvo.


Njegovo zadnje uradno ljubezensko razmerje sega v leto 1999 z Jennifer Syme.

To pa se je počasi začelo spreminjati, ko je v njegovo življenje vstopila vsestranska umetnica Alexandra Grant, s katero sta – sprva le poslovno – prvič staknila glavi leta 2011 pri ustvarjanju knjige Ode to Happiness, ki je bila igralčev knjižni prvenec. Keanu je spisal poezijo, Alexandra pa jo je opremila z ilustracijami, kar je bil očitno začetek ne le plodnega sodelovanja, temveč tudi lepega prijateljstva.Pet let pozneje sta s skupnimi močmi izdala še knjigo Shadows, on vnovič kot pisec, ona spet v vlogi ilustratorke. Leta 2016 sta ustanovila založniško hišo X Artists' Books. »Nekateri ljudje so sanjači, ki imajo kopico idej, a jih ne uresničijo. Midva pa sva sanjača, ki si želiva svoje ideje tudi uresničiti, in to res storiva,« je o skupnem projektu založniške hiše dejala Grantova.Poslovno sodelovanje je preraslo v prijateljstvo, sčasoma pa so med Reevesom in Grantovo očitno začele preskakovati tudi iskrice. Kdaj, ni znano, a minuli mesec jima rastoče medsebojne naklonjenosti ni več uspelo skrivati.


Govorice o romanci so začele krožiti minuli mesec.

Paparaci so ju opazili med večerjo, s katere sta odšla objeta, kar je zagnalo kolesje govoric, da je privlačnemu zvezdniku po dveh desetletjih samskega življenja morda nekdo vendar ukradel srce. Njegovo zadnje uradno ljubezensko razmerje namreč sega v prelom tisočletja, ko mu je srce utripalo za Jennifer Syme, s katero si je Keanu že zamišljal družinsko idilo, a mu jo je ukradla usoda.Ljubimkati sta začela v 90. letih prejšnjega stoletja, Jennifer je zanosila, a po osmih mesecih veselega pričakovanja je sledila največja žalost. Njuna hčerka Ava je bila mrtvorojena. Nesojeni starši, ki jih je trgala neznosna bolečina, so jo položili v grobek. Tragedija je pokopala tudi njuno razmerje, komaj leto in pol pozneje, ko sta ju povezovala le še prijateljstvo in skupna bolečina po izgubi otroka, pa je Jennifer umrla v prometni nesreči.»Žalost nikoli ne izgine, le spremeni svojo obliko,« je dejal zvezdnik, ki se je po dvojni izgubil zavlekel v osamo.
9 let je Alexandra mlajša od 55-letnega zvezdnika.
»Ljudje so v zmoti, ko pravijo, da čas zaceli vse rane. Resnica je, da ljudje, ki si jih ljubil, izginejo, ti pa ostaneš sam.« A čeprav je po letih prostovoljne izoliranosti poskušal znova sestaviti razbite koščke življenja in si ustvariti novo, je priznal, da je to vsakodnevni boj s samim seboj. »Rad bi se poročil in želim si otrok, a to je končni cilj. Zanj moram najprej stopiti na pot novega življenja,« je dejal, a vseeno še naprej skozi svoje dni stopal sam. Vsa leta do zdaj, ko se je na rdeči preprogi prvič pojavil z dekletom in več kot jasno pokazal, da ljubi in je ljubljen. Igralec in Alexandra namreč nista izpustila rok, si pred objektivi fotografov zaljubljeno zrla v oči in se smejala, kot bi množica okoli njiju ne obstajala in bi bila na svetu le onadva.
text:
After 20 years, she loves again
Actor Keanu Reeves showed Alexandro on the red carpet. His last official relationship ended in 1999.
07 Nov 2019, 19:00 by T.P.



He showed the world that he loves again and is loved. PHOTO: gulliver / cover images



Rumors of romance began to circulate last month.



His last official love affair dates back to 1999 with Jennifer Syme.



guliver / cover images He was romantically linked to Sandra Bullock, but it was never more than a friendship. PHOTO: gulliver / cover images



instagram He and Alexandra were initially connected by professional collaboration and friendship. PHOTO: instagram



gulliver / GETTY IMAGESWill sadness and heartache now disappear from his sight? PHOTO: gulliver / getty images


In a world of the beautiful and the rich, whose pockets are full of cinematic delusions, changing partners is not uncommon. Movie stars fall in love and part ways like a treadmill. Probably faster than ordinary mortals, but certainly much more high profile and in the public eye. That's why when one of the heavyweight Hollywood heavyweights shows a new heartthrob (or electorate) on the red carpet, we barely even get our eyes on it.


Will sadness and heartache now disappear from his sight? PHOTO: gulliver / getty imagesguliver / GETTY IMAGES

But not when it comes to Keanu Reeves; if a crush on the red carpet was a yardstick, one might argue that he never had a serious girlfriend in his life. In his 35 years in Hollywood, for the first time, he has walked the red groin holding hands, in love, glances and gentle touches. Women adore him. In the past, he was associated with several film beauties, including Sandra Bullock, Amanda de Cadenet and Claire Forlani, but he either heard these rumors or dismissed them as unfounded, claiming that he was only friends with them.


His last official love affair dates back to 1999 with Jennifer Syme.

This, however, slowly began to change when versatile artist Alexandra Grant entered his life, with whom - initially only in business - he first hit his head in 2011 to create the book Ode to Happiness, which was the player's book debut. Keanu wrote poetry, and Alexandra provided illustrations, which was clearly the beginning of not only fruitful collaboration but also a beautiful friendship. Five years later she and Shadows published a book together, again as a writer, again as an illustrator. . In 2016, they founded the publishing house X Artists' Books. “Some people are dreamers who have a lot of ideas, but they don't realize them. But we are dreamers who want to put our ideas into action, and we really do, "Grant said of the joint publishing house project. Business cooperation has grown into a friendship, and over time, sparkles between Reeves and Grant apparently began to leap. When, it is not known, but last month they were no longer able to hide their growing affection.


Rumors of romance began to circulate last month.

The paparazzi spotted them during the dinner party, which triggered the embrace, which triggered a rumor that, after two decades of being alone, the attractive celebrity may have stolen someone's heart. His last official love affair dates back to the turn of the millennium, when his heart was beating for Jennifer Syme, with whom Keanu had already imagined a family idyll but was stolen by his fate. , but after eight months of joyful anticipation, the greatest sorrow followed. Their daughter Ava was stillborn. Unmarried parents who were plagued by unbearable pain put her in a grave. The tragedy also buried their relationship, barely a year and a half later, when only friendship and mutual pain linked them after the loss of a child, and Jennifer died in a car accident. , who, after a double loss, lost himself in solitary confinement.
Alexandra is 9 years old than a 55-year-old star.
“People are mistaken in saying that time heals all wounds. The truth is that the people you loved disappear and you are left alone. ”But after years of voluntary isolation, he tried to re-assemble shattered pieces of life and create a new one, he admitted that it was a daily struggle with himself. “I want to get married and I want a baby, but that is the ultimate goal. I must first step into the path of a new life for him, ”he said, but he continued to walk through his days alone. All the years until now, when he first appeared on the red carpet with a girl, and more than clearly showed that he loved and was loved. The actor and Alexandra did not let go of their hands, staring in love at the lens of photographers, laughing as if the crowd around them did not exist and would be the only place in the world.
